Text: I don't have this series. Game 1 was in great quality!!! Huge work again from Nepotu. Thank you!!! I will seed!
Thank you ivo for your appreciation!

I see interesting names in the Hawks roster, much of them I saw playing for other team - Carr, Levingston, Doc Rivers, Web plus Wilkins and Willis. Unfortunately for them every eastern team who wanted to reach the NBA Finals during 80' must face Celtics with their Great stars - Bird, McHale and Parish.
You're a great NBA commentator, ivo1978! I like your comments.
Thank you my friend! All credits goes for you:-)
Thank you, bro! ...and for seeding too!
